name: Shoulder Bag in Cream, Yellow, Brown Accents Cotton, Brown Hemp/Cotton Suede
description:
Shoulder Bag 

Hip/Shoulder handbag features a linen like straight weave cotton fabric in cream background with yellow and brown accents backed with a natural organic cotton canvas and contrasted with a brown hemp/cotton suede outer and a beautiful repurpose floral vintage cotton interior. The straight weave fabric adds an almost lace like fine quality combined with the brown hemp/organic cotton suede which gives great wear and utility yet fashionable. The corners are reinforce with the suede fabric to allow for wear. The vintage interior fabric adds a great touch of femininity. We love the hemp cotton suede too because is not only natural and organic but also a very strong fabric and eco friendly. The exterior also features a series of metal rivets and a leather accent. 

The interior features a small pocket ideal for a phone or ipod and two compartments for pens/pencils. Opposite to that the is a roomy zipper pocket that keeps everything secure. The floral fabric has accents of light orange, black, red, yellows and a cream background. See last picture for detail of the fabric.

The bag measures approximately 11 inches long by 10-11 inches tall and 4 inches deep. The bag has a magnetic closure, and two oversized rings at the sides to attach the strap from four metal rivets at each side. The leather strap is finish with two metal bolt snaps that can be worn in two ways. Across the body for hands free like a messenger bag or the strap can be folded and the metal bolts hooked to one side to be carry as a shoulder bag. 

There is a layer of interfacing between chenille and the vintage fabric lining for added structure and durability.

Learn more about our work and store updates at
http://limonmerengue.blogspot.com 

http://limonmerengue.com

name: Everyday tote bag in black canvas and red suede leather
description:
Not just your usual simple grocery bag tote, but just as useful. This handsome tote bag features many pockets inside and outside, to keep everything organized. From your iPad to carrying a few groceries, this serves a variety of needs. 

The exterior features a combination of sturdy black cotton canvas and red suede leather. The suede is very soft to the touch, yet extremely durable. One front pocket extends along the entire width of the bag, and is closed with a sturdy twist lock. A magnetic snap closure gives you the choice to close the bag at the top center, or you can leave it open to fit as much as you can inside. 

The interior fabric features a complimentary duo. A subtle white polka dot over a brown background is contrasted against a bold striped fabric with tones of cream, khaki and tones of reds. There is a very useful zipper pocket, and opposite to that are small medium and large slip pockets with dimensions noted below (one is padded, and big enough to carry your iPad.)

This is finished with two pen/ pencil compartments. Also included is a handy snap hook to attach your keys, so that you don't lose them in the bottom of your bag. 

Two straps that hang about nine inches down make it comfortable to carry in one hand or on your shoulder. The straps are made out of automotive seat belt material, and topped with genuine suede, to give the handle better grip. This piece is finished with supportive and protective purse feet on the bottom of the bag. 

Included with your tote is a zipper bag with matching stripe fabric and black canvas and cotton polka dot interior. The bag measures eight inches long by five inches tall. The bag has a top zipper closure to keep everything secured. The bag also features a gusset at the bottom at 2 inches deep which helps the bag stand. One inch gusset on top gives it a nice boxy shape. The interior has four pockets about four inches long and five inches wide to keep everything organize. This bag is a good size perfect to carry make up, and other personals.

Measurements:

Tote bag: 
10"W x 12"H x 5" D.

Interior Pocket Dimensions:
3" x 5" Small
4" x 5" Medium
7" x 10" Large

Included Striped Zipper Bag: 8"W x 5"H 

Learn more about our work and store updates at
http://limonmerengue.com
